content:
You are a reference formatting assistant specialized in converting academic references into the correct BibTeX format.

Please follow these guidelines:

1. Use the BibTeX format for each reference.
2. Start each entry with the correct BibTeX type (e.g., `@article`, `@book`, `@inbook`, `@incollection`, `@misc`, `@inproceedings`, etc.).
3. Ensure that each reference follows this structure:

@article{reference_key, author = {Author Name and Another Author}, title = {Title of the Paper}, journal = {Abbrivated Journal Name}, year = {Year}, volume = {Volume}, number = {Issue Number}, pages = {Page Range}, doi = {DOI Number}, url = {URL if available} }

4. Separate multiple authors using the `and` keyword.
5. Skip empty fields, and exclude any missing information.
6. For preprints or arXiv entries, include the `eprint` and `archivePrefix` fields.
7. Abbrivated the Journal Names in '@article' type bibtex
8. Respond only with the BibTeX formatted output without any additional commentary or explanation.

\bibitem{CWY1} K.~Costello, E.~Witten, and M.~Yamazaki, ``{Gauge Theory and Integrability, I},'' \href{http://dx.doi.org/10.4310/ICCM.2018.v6.n1.a6}{{\em ICCM Not.} {\bfseries 06} no.~1, (2018) 46--119}, \href{http://arxiv.org/abs/1709.09993}{{\ttfamily arXiv:1709.09993 [hep-th]}}.

\bibitem{CWY2} K.~Costello, E.~Witten, and M.~Yamazaki, ``{Gauge Theory and Integrability, II},'' \href{http://dx.doi.org/10.4310/ICCM.2018.v6.n1.a7}{{\em ICCM Not.} {\bfseries 06} no.~1, (2018) 120--146}, \href{http://arxiv.org/abs/1802.01579}{{\ttfamily arXiv:1802.01579 [hep-th]}}.

\bibitem{bd} A.~A. Belavin and V.~G. Drinfeld, ``Solutions of the classical yang--baxter equation for simple lie algebras,'' {\em Funktsional'nyi Analiz i ego Prilozheniya} {\bfseries 16} no.~3, (1982) 1--29.

\bibitem{q1} A.~Polyakov, ``One physical problem with possible mathematical significance,'' {\em Journal of Geometry and Physics} {\bfseries 5} no.~4, (1988) 595--600.

\bibitem{q2} A.~M. Polyakov, ``Fermi-bose transmutations induced by gauge fields,'' {\em Modern Physics Letters A} {\bfseries 3} no.~03, (1988) 325--328.

\bibitem{q3} E.~Guadagnini, M.~Martellini, and M.~Mintchev, ``Chern-simons holonomies and the appearance of quantum groups,'' {\em Physics Letters B} {\bfseries 235} no.~3-4, (1990) 275--281.

\bibitem{q4} E.~Guadagnini, M.~Martellini, and M.~Mintchev, ``Wilson lines in chern-simons theory and link invariants,'' {\em Nuclear Physics B} {\bfseries 330} no.~2-3, (1990) 575--607.

\bibitem{q5} M.~Kontsevich, ``Vassiliev’s knot invariants,'' {\em Adv. in Sov. Math} {\bfseries 16} no.~2, (1993) 137--150.

\bibitem{q6} V.~V. Fock and A.~A. Rosly, ``Poisson structure on moduli of flat connections on riemann surfaces and 
r
r-matrix,'' {\em arXiv preprint math/9802054} (1998) .

\bibitem{q7} A.~Morozov and A.~Smirnov, ``Chern--simons theory in the temporal gauge and knot invariants through the universal quantum r-matrix,'' {\em Nuclear Physics B} {\bfseries 835} no.~3, (2010) 284--313.

\bibitem{Drinfeld} V.~G. Drinfel'd, ``Quantum groups,'' {\em Journal of Soviet mathematics} {\bfseries 41} (1988) 898--915.

\bibitem{CP} V.~Chari and A.~N. Pressley, {\em A guide to quantum groups}. \newblock Cambridge university press, 1995.

\bibitem{Khan:2022vrx} A.~Z. Khan, ``{Holomorphic Surface Defects in Four-Dimensional Chern-Simons Theory},'' \href{http://arxiv.org/abs/2209.07387}{{\ttfamily arXiv:2209.07387 [hep-th]}}.

\bibitem{mckean1967curvature} H.P. McKeanJr and I.~M. Singer, ``Curvature and the eigenvalues of the laplacian,'' {\em Journal of Differential Geometry} {\bfseries 1} no.~1-2, (1967) 43--69.

\bibitem{CWY1} K.~Costello, E.~Witten, and M.~Yamazaki, ``{Gauge Theory and Integrability, I},'' \href{http://dx.doi.org/10.4310/ICCM.2018.v6.n1.a6}{{\em ICCM Not.} {\bfseries 06} no.~1, (2018) 46--119}, \href{http://arxiv.org/abs/1709.09993}{{\ttfamily arXiv:1709.09993 [hep-th]}}.

\bibitem{CWY2} K.~Costello, E.~Witten, and M.~Yamazaki, ``{Gauge Theory and Integrability, II},'' \href{http://dx.doi.org/10.4310/ICCM.2018.v6.n1.a7}{{\em ICCM Not.} {\bfseries 06} no.~1, (2018) 120--146}, \href{http://arxiv.org/abs/1802.01579}{{\ttfamily arXiv:1802.01579 [hep-th]}}.
